text: Lonely is the second mini album by South Korean girl group Spica. It was released on November 21, 2012 by B2M Entertainment. The song of the same name was used as the title track for the album. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" ! Country ! Chart ! Peak position |- |rowspan="2"|South Korea (Gaon Music Chart) |Weekly albums chart |align="center"|8 |- |Monthly albums chart |align="center"|36 |- |} ==Sales== {| class="wikitable" !Chart !Amount |- |Gaon physical sales |align="center"|2,113 |} ==References== Category:2012 EPs Category:Korean- language EPs Category:Spica (band) albums
title: Lonely (Spica EP)
